name: papra
description: Papra is a self-hosted document workflow and approval software for teams. It supports configurable pipelines, document metadata, role-based access control, and collaboration.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Configure multi-stage approval pipelines with sequential or parallel review steps for document processing

features.title: Document Metadata
features.description: Define custom metadata fields to capture document-specific information and enable structured data collection

features.title: Role
features.description: Control who can view, edit, approve, or reject documents based on user roles and organizational

features.title: Pipeline Configuration
features.description: Create custom workflow templates with conditional routing, automated actions, and approval requirements

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Comment on documents, mention team members, and track discussions within approval process for context

features.title: Status Tracking
features.description: Monitor document progress through workflow stages with visual indicators and real-time status updates

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Automated alerts notify stakeholders when documents require action, are approved, or reach specific stages

features.title: Audit Trail
features.description: Complete history of document actions, approvals, and changes for compliance and accountability tracking
